post.body: i'm so excited you're on here, just in case you didn't know
okay, i'll do that! i'll text you when we are about to head over
i know!! do you know what time people will be staying till? robert is here this weekend too. is it ok to drag him along?
i'm so freakin proud of you!
AHHHH!!!!!!! FINALLY!!!!!!!!!!
best of luck in school to you and thanks for the luck in wedding planning, i'll need it!
That's pretty cool that they are talking about Twitter and social networking now in PR/marketing. In my opinion, it's def. important
I tweet for my work account - @lehighvalleypa. We are the tourism promotion bureau for Lehigh Valley - i'm in marketing there.
wedding planning is coming along slowly. we've decided to get married in Lancaster for sure - just need to confirm our date!
I'm glad to hear school is going so good for you! Now that I am out of school, i sometimes wish i were there again.
I think you are the first person I know that I didn't persuade to sign up for Twitter! A lot of people don't even know what it is
i think Twitter needs to work out a better system of finding specific friends by name on here. right now there's no good way :(
how is it up there in new york city??
haha. i can't tell you or i might have to kill ya
got some shopping done but still not finished happy for payday though-i was frightened at my bank account after yesterday's shopping
at least the cookies get spread out between people here. if i had them at home, they'd all be going in my belly! glad u liked it!
nah, i gots loads and loads of cleaning to do at home and once i get into that, i'll prolly be too stinky to leave the house
i gotta just go in there w/ one thing on my mind and get in and get out. wish me luck!
oh just mike yelling about not opening the fridge because there's so much s*** in there (or something like that) lol
my aunt and her kids go to the movies on Christmas day. i'm more for traditional traditions but they make it their own tradition!
haha. i was wondering if i would see you on here today since you had off! well i guess you have off right? i know, i'm a slacker.
congrats!
it's so quiet at the office today. i feel like it should be 5:00 on a monday and time to go home. doesn't help w/ making the time go faster!
i have 2 burp from this carbonated drink. 2 reasons why i won't: 1. it will come out louder than i expect, it's building. 2. professionalism
i've ALMOST successfully spilled my diet dr. pepper, my glass of H20 from yesterday and my wild cherry clear splash drink today. clutz.
thinking about whether or not officezilla will work for our office/marketing team or not.
i now officially have 5 "real-life" friends on twitter. my life is almost complete. but 2 of them don't count cuz they never talk on here!
2 hours until i split this joint :)
gotta make a new "to do" list, my current list is too long and MESSY - can't stand it! :)
We send out a lot of our press releases through Twitter and we have some reporters and writers that follow us so at least they are seeing it
oh! and a POCKET CALENDAR!! (i <3 calendars)
i received my first vendor Christmas gift - whoohoo!!! a poinsettia and logoed goodies! alright for me!
Online advent calendar - http://budurl.com/bj3t. will you click on the link for me? i'm trying out this url shortener. thanks!! fun too!
i'm thirsty for soda right now. wish we had a soda machine up in here (like my terminology?)
i feel so gross--i've been eating cookies all day. just had one of the cookies i made and i don't like it. gross
my eyes are burning, which in turn is making me tired, which in turn makes me wanna go home which in turn makes me want to sleep.
frustrated with my computer...it takes forever for one window to pop up!!
whos the drummer boy in the hallway?
Alright, time to check off all the things on my to-do list. starting....NOW!
linkin park's "my december" was on my x-mas music station. wha? cuz its bout december? not my idea of a christmas song (i do like it tho)
OH YEA....i like this song...trans siberian orchestra. makes me think of Robert. he turns into a crazy conductor when this song comes on
Brought in a platter of cookies to work so i won't eat them at home. Now i'm just eating them at work.
Monday...
got a lot of shopping done but i still have probably a little bit less than half to go!
I went all weekend w/out getting on my computer until now. that's gotta be a record.
sooo excited for Lost to come back on in January!
i probably just cursed myself!
wish me luck. i'm braving the mall. hope i come out alive.
how crowded do you think the south mall in allentown will be around 5:30 or so?
got my mom a yoga dvd and mat cuz we are all trying to get in shape in the new year. what kinda exercises do men do?
any other suggestions for a stepdad gift? likes golf, computr games, men's health mag (already has sub), works at lumber mill, long commute
got a bunch of things crossed off my list today. see @larnaye, my snack & lotion made me work better! sticking my tongue out at u right now.
sometimes the conversations i hear coming from the hallway make me chuckle a little. :)
YES! Somehow i was able to score one of my 2 gifts i still needed to get today already. sweet! only one to go -but its the harder of the 2.
i guess it seems the more i concentrate on work things, the faster the day goes. i guess i gotta be consumed by it or nothin.
should have put my lotion on after i ate my snacks. now all i smell/taste is lotion!
alrighty. ready to get down to business. starting...NOW.
my browser is acting all funny. wish it would stop.
11:00, thats it?
i'm feeling artsy today. i love my new desktop background. i know...big nerd thing to say...
